text: (nabiye!) yudevvanda, samanayan taba namadinnanda, visvasavantayinta minisun siyallangenma darunu saturan bavata sitinu niyata vasayenma oba dakinnehiya! kavurun tamanva kristiyanuvan yayi pavasannoda, ovun visvasavantayinta (ovunta vada) snehavantabhavayen itamat samipastayan bavata dakinnehiya! mandayat ovungen (igena gat) pandivarunda, sanyasivarunda sitinnaha. tavada ovun undagu vanneda nÃ¦ta
